2.<center>|怒れるガズバランが 打ち込みし|炎のくさびは 大地を焼きつくし: The wedge of flame driven by the angry|Gazbalan burned the earth... <end>.

3.<center>|我の うつろなる身を満たすのは 復讐の念。|我は そなたを 滅: The thought of revenge fills my empty body. I|am the one who will destroy you. <end>

5.<center>|哀れみのピナヘトが 打ち込みし|氷のくさびは 糧を凍らせつくし: The wedge of ice that Pinaheto, in his pity,|drove into the ground, froze the sustenance...|<end>...

6.<center>|我の うつろなる身を満たすのは 復讐の念。|我は そなたを 滅: The thought of revenge fills my empty body. I|am the one who will destroy you. <end>

8.<center>|荒ぶるワギが 打ち込みし|闇のくさびは 光ある大地を奪った……: The wedge of darkness driven by the raging|Wagi has taken the land of light... <end>.

9.<center>|我の うつろなる身を満たすのは 復讐の念。|我は そなたを 滅: The thought of revenge fills my empty body. I|am the one who will destroy you. <end>

11.<center>|嘆きのマリーヌが 打ち込みし|水のくさびは 水底に町を沈めた…: The wedge of water driven in by the lamenting|Marine sank the town to the bottom of the|water... <end>

12.<center>|我の うつろなる身を満たすのは 復讐の念。|我は そなたを 滅: The thought of revenge fills my empty body. I|am the one who will destroy you. <end>

14.<center>|悔やめるエルドナが 打ち込みし|嵐のくさびは 天地を吹き荒らし: The wedge of the storm that the repentant|Eldona drove into the earth blew through|heaven and earth... <end>.

15.<center>|我の うつろなる身を満たすのは 復讐の念。|我は そなたを 滅: The thought of revenge fills my empty body. I|am the one who will destroy you. <end>

16.<left>竜神の柩への道が 開かれた！: The way to the Dragon King's Coffin is open!

17.<left>なんと 銀の森の 不思議な霧が晴れあがり|<left>森の奥へと 進: And now the mysterious mists of the Silver|Forest have lifted, and we can proceed deeper|into the forest!<me 71>
